scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n BACKEND,FRONTEND -c blue,green "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend -- --hostname 0.0.0.0 --port 3000"
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix backend && npm run build --prefix frontend
scripts.setup: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend && npm install
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run setup
